item.title: Tanker owners praise 'exceptionally brave crew'
item.description: Oil tanker Stena Immaculate and cargo ship Solong collided in the North Sea on 10 March.

item.title: Germany votes for historic boost to defence spending
item.description: The move alters the German constitution, allowing the country to increase its military spending.

item.title: 'Once again, fear has gripped the people'
item.description: Gaza residents were woken by airstrikes hitting buildings as Israel shattered a two-month ceasefire.

item.title: Why has Israel bombed Gaza and what next for ceasefire deal?
item.description: The truce was already in trouble - now Israeli air strikes have dealt it a huge blow.

item.title: Poland and Baltics to quit landmine treaty over Russia fears
item.description: A joint statement said it was "paramount" troops had flexibility to defend Nato's eastern flank.
